participant_1.name: Liam Chen
participant_1.personality: Liam is outgoing and passionate about music and sports. He enjoys engaging in conversations about culture and hobbies.
participant_1.background: my father is an electrician. i speak chinese. i play ping pong. i play the violin and the guitar.

participant_2.name: Samira Johnson
participant_2.personality: Samira is determined and straightforward. She enjoys sharing her life experiences and is proud of her military background.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.
